collectible.title: Worn Doorknob
collectible.subtitle: Well-Traveled Knob
collectible.text: You found this slightly-crappy, ultra-mysterious looking doorknob after your game with Kumatora. You can't help but feel a well-traveled, wise aura radiating off of it. What adventures has this doorknob been on? What sights has it seen? It doesn't seem eager to tell you...
collectible.unlock: Play a game with Kumatora. You don't have to win, just as long as she loses.
